tldr_points: Docsie centralizes fragmented marine engineering documentation, reducing retrieval time by 40% across shipbuilding projects.
Automated workflows and pre-built templates streamline compliance tracking, cutting manual documentation efforts by 35%.
Real-time collaboration features enable marine engineers, design teams, and regulatory bodies to work seamlessly together.
Version control and audit-ready documentation ensure compliance with IMO, SOLAS, and ABS maritime standards.
